ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix 1.3.0 crashes hard
ygData.msgSnippet: Tried same seed set on same machine with 1.5 GB heap size.  Still crashed... Then I switched to JRE 1.4.2 and used the 1.5 GB heap and it s still running after

Tried same seed set on same machine with 1.5 GB heap size.  Still 
crashed...

Then I switched to JRE 1.4.2 and used the 1.5 GB heap and it's still 
running after 12 hours. It seems to be a bit slower, but it's 
running.

Thanks,
greg

> 
> Thanks for the great detail.  I made an issue and put the below 
into it: 
> https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
func=detail&aid=1121567&group_id=73833&atid=539099
> 
> Maybe try with a smaller heap size than 2gigs -- 1.7 or so.  You 
might 
> try the 1.4.2x JVM to see if this makes a difference.  Do you have 
a 
> another linux version and/or other machine to try it on (Is this --
 
> OS:Red Hat Enterprise Linux WS release 3 -- fedora fc3)?
> 
> St.Ack
